message_1: In the Trust Game, Player A is given 20 tokens and must decide how many tokens to send to Player B. Whatever Player A sends, Player B's tokens will be tripled. Player B must then decide how many tokens to send back to Player A. If Player B decides to send back 30 tokens, how many tokens did Player A send in the first place?
message_2:
Let x be the number of tokens Player A sends to Player B. After tripling, Player B receives 3x tokens. Since Player B sends back 30 tokens to Player A, we can set up the following equation:

3x - 30 = 0

Now, we can solve for x:

3x = 30
x = 30 / 3
x = 10

So, Player A sent 10 tokens to Player B in the first place.
